analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x79c9a391582e14a2bedf25f84f335d00229b5e22.sol:
	Contract TeleGrams has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x79c9a391582e14a2bedf25f84f335d00229b5e22.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x79c9a391582e14a2bedf25f84f335d00229b5e22.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/27/0x79c9a391582e14a2bedf25f84f335d00229b5e22.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x79c9a391582e14a2bedf25f84f335d00229b5e22.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
